Resolved Question Show me another » Eco plastic cups? [10 points]? my friend told me that if you bring those eco plastic cups to a fast food restaurant and get your drink filled with your cups instead of the restaurants cups, you will get a discount. is this true? 1 year ago Report Abuse by Emily M Member since: 07 January 2007 Total points: 677 (Level 2) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Voters I've never heard of that. I know they give you a 10 cent discount off of your drink when you bring a reusable cup/mug at Starbucks. Source(s): experience 1 year ago Report Abuse 57% 4 Votes 1 person rated this as good
Action Bar: 0 stars - mark this as Interesting! Email Comment ( 0 ) Save RSS

Other Answers (1)
by Espeonz Member since: 02 June 2008 Total points: 221 (Level 1) Add Contact Block It really depends on the restaurant. Some restaurants do it but others don't. I suggest the place ahead of time to see if they will give you a discount 1 year ago Report Abuse 43% 3 Votes
